entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `friends_name` TEXT NOT NULL, `image_url` TEXT)

indices.name: index_chat_friends_friends_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_chat_friends_friends_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`friends_name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `chat_friends_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `content` TEXT NOT NULL, `timestamp` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`chat_friends_id`) REFERENCES `chat_friends`(`id`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_messages_chat_friends_id
indices.createSql: CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_messages_chat_friends_id` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chat_friends_id`)

views.createSql:
CREATE VIEW `${VIEW_NAME}` AS SELECT cf.*, m.content lastMessage, m.timestamp lastMessageTimestamp
        FROM chat_friends cf 
        INNER JOIN messages m ON m.chat_friends_id = cf.id
        WHERE m.id = (
            SELECT id
            FROM messages
            WHERE chat_friends_id = cf.id
            ORDER BY timestamp DESC
            LIMIT 1
        )

setupQueries: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS room_master_table (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,identity_hash TEXT)
